keyMoments.title: Massive Battle Against New Fish-Man Pirates
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates engage in fierce battles against the New Fish-Man Pirates officers, showcasing their post-timeskip abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's growth and strength after two years of training.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Works with Neptune Princes
keyMoments.description: Luffy collaborates with the Neptune royal family to protect Shirahoshi and prevent Noah from destroying Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Straw Hats' alliance with the Fish-Man Island royalty.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Officers Consume Energy Steroids
keyMoments.description: The New Fish-Man Pirates officers (Ikaros Much, Daruma, Zeo, and Dosun) all take Energy Steroids before facing the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's desperation and willingness to use dangerous performance enhancers.

keyMoments.title: Hody Jones Pursues Shirahoshi
keyMoments.description: Captain Hody Jones relentlessly chases Shirahoshi, intent on killing the Mermaid Princess.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's main objective and Hody's ruthless determination.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a sun symbol representing the Arlong Pirates' legacy
